description:
Komi spends a lot of time getting ready for her trip to the local pool with Tadano and Najimi. Once they`re there, they bump into even more friends.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: It`s Just the Pool. / It`s Just Shaved Ice. / It`s Just a Library. / It`s Just a Park.
Pool Desu. / Kakigoori Desu. / Toshokan Desu. / Kouen Desu.
プールです. / かき氷です. / 図書館です. / 公園です.
